title: shareBoost
desc: Scientists and Activists share Boost effects

title: lastCardTwice
desc: When you play the last card in your hand, it plays twice

title: drawWhenEmpty
desc: If the hand is empty, draw a card

title: saveNature
desc: When a Nature loss occurs, spawn 2 Activists

title: saveIndustry
desc: When an Industry loss occurs, spawn 2 Scientists

title: discardAndDraw
desc: At the beginning of your turn, discard a card and draw 1
